name: mongodb-admin
description: A Web user interface to administer MongoDB databases built using Express.
preInstallNotes:
In order for MongoDB Admin service to start successfully it requires atleast 0.3 CPU and 256MB of RAM. WARNING: MongoDB Admin on DCOS is currently EXPERIMENTAL. There may be bugs, incomplete
features, incorrect documentation, or other discrepancies.
If the `external_access` installation option is selected, this package creates an entry in the External Load Balancer for accessing the service from outside of the cluster on port `27018` by default.

Security Notice: JSON documents are parsed through a javascript virtual machine, so the web interface can be used for executing malicious javascript on a server. MongoDB Admin should only be used privately for development purposes.

In order to use in conjunction with the DC/OS mongodb package, please connect to the server `mongodb.marathon.l4lb.thisdcos.directory'
postInstallNotes:
MongoDB Admin has been installed.

You can now access the UI at `http://your_DCOS_URL/services/mongodb-admin` or at `http://your_public_node_ip:27018` if you selected `external_access` on installation.

DC/OS PostgreSQL default Login: `admin`
Default password: `password`
